user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you help me find a playlist on Soundcloud that has upbeat tracks? It would also be great if you could provide me with the lyrics of a popular song from that playlist. Additionally, fetch me the comments for that song from SongMeanings.

TaskList.description: Search for a playlist on Soundcloud that contains upbeat tracks.
Select a popular song from the retrieved playlist.
Fetch the lyrics for the selected popular song.
Retrieve the comments for the song from SongMeanings.
